  • Reference

Reference

p-value

Functions for caculating p-value in a visual test

sim_dist()

Approximate the distribution of number of detections of a lineup with simulation

calc_p_value()

Calculate p-value for a visual test

calc_p_value_comb()

Calculate p-value for all combinations of evaluations of a lineup.

calc_p_value_multi()

Calculate p-value for multiple lineups.

eval_p_value()

Evaluate test for given p-value and significance level

pseudo OOP

Functions for building a pseudo OOP system

register_method()

Register method for an instance

register_class_ctor()

Register class constructor

inherit()

Declare inheritance inside a class constructor

class_method()

Get the class method

is_instance()

Check whether an environment is an instance built by a class constructor

BASE()

Base class constructor

print(<pseudo_oop>)

S3 method of printing pseudo_oop object

utilties

Utility functions

define_pkg_fn()

Load functions from package namespaces into current environment

bind_fn_2_env()

Bind functions of the current environment to a target environment
